author: gturrell
msg: This change introduces local copies of the XMLSchema and wsdl20 schema (held in package org.apache.woden.resolver) into the woden jar .
The simple URI resolver is extended to automatically reference the local schema copies in preference to the external locations, to allow offline parsing
and generally improve performance. The schema.catalog resolver file (installed to woden jar /meta-inf at build time) contains the references to the local
schema and is generally left unaltered by the user. The regular ("user") catalog is optionally defined and referenced in the

author: danielf
msg: Moved some test cases to cocoon-common, cocoon-pipeline-impl and cocoon-util and made them work.

author: maartenc
msg: Changed name of ant-contribs own ivy project to avoid conflict with the real ivy project.
